thread.title: Neil Taylor is hammered on Twitter after breaking Seamus Coleman’s leg… but it’s an ex councillor taking the brunt of the abuse

author: gboulton
title: Neil Taylor is hammered on Twitter after breaking Seamus Coleman’s leg… but it’s an ex councillor taking the brunt of the abuse
text:
EFL 'I don't even like football' Neil Taylor is hammered on Twitter after breaking Seamus Coleman’s leg… but it’s an ex councillor taking the brunt of the abuse 
Defender's horror tackle broke the Everton star's leg but abuse over social media has gone to the wrong man By George Boulton 26th March 2017, 2:25 pm Updated: 26th March 2017, 4:51 pm
